attributes.action: Keep the housing market open during COVID-19 national lockdown
attributes.background: To allow the housing market to stay open as I am personally in a situation where contracts have been exchanged in the chain and an agreed moving date has been set to the 6th November. I am sure there will be similar situations across the country.

rejection.details:
The Government has said that people can still move house during lockdown and that the housing market will remain open. 

You can find out more here: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/new-national-restrictions-from-5-november#moving-home
